import { Fade,Slide } from "react-awesome-reveal"; import Strength2 from "../components/strength2"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import img1 from '../components/assets/img1.png'; import img2 from '../components/assets/img2.png'; import img3 from '../components/assets/img3.png'; import Products from "../components/productsComponent"; import DemoCarousel from "../components/cardSlider"; const Home =()=>{ useEffect(() => { // Scroll to the top of the page when the component mounts window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(true); const handleModalClose = () => { setShowModal(false); }; const handleFormSubmit = (event) => { // Handle form submission logic here event.preventDefault(); // Add your logic to handle form submission }; // useEffect to show the modal on component mount useEffect(() => { setShowModal(true); }, []); return( <> {/* carousel */}
{/* Adjusted for a 3-second interval */}

Powdered perfection

Every particle matters

Redefining Precision Standards

) } export default Home
